token.ccc-writeup: The idea of a prestigious Columbarium in the heart of Kuala Lumpur city centre was conceptualised after due diligence in various aspects of planning, design, innovation, technology & expertise were explored and digested.  CITY CENTRE COLUMBARIUM is strategically located in Sungai Besi, Kuala Lumpur, which is a short 5 minutes' drive from the renowned Petronas Twin Towers. Scheduled to commence construction in the year 2021, this CITY CENTRE COLUMBARIUM, being officially registered as a Memorial Park, will rise 15 floors and anchored by 4 levels of basement for parking and service space.This unique Columbarium will be one of the most stylish facilities in Malaysia and will be managed with high-tech driven systems. It is constructed to endure for generations, harmonising the magnificent architectural craftsmanship with the religious beliefs and cultural practices of the urbanites. The City Centre Columbarium reflects the harmonious blend of light and shadow in the realm of life and sustainability.  The Columbarium will be standing proudly in Kuala Lumpur overlooking the city from a high vantage point, playing an important role of preserving the memory of loved ones.
token.cycle-of-life-writeup: The Cycle of Life.  Autumn leaves to winter snow, and the buds of life in Spring.  Each lifetime has its hopes and miracles, happiness and serenity, joys of families and friends, and the sadness of leaving.  To hold and cherish the memories of times gone by, herein the resting place of those dear to our hearts, preserved for eternity for our future generations to behold.  The CITY CENTRE COLUMBARIUM is the rainbow’s end of our life’s journey.
token.niches-writeup: The niches in the Columbarium are finely crafted with finesse.  The niches range include Single, Double and Family-size.  Soothing themes intricately emblazoned on the finely crafted panels, exuding a sense of peace and calmness.  A restful place to honour the departed loved ones for eternity.  Quiet and respectful, reflecting the deep love and care we feel for those who have left us.
token.mem-tablets-writeup: City Centre Columbarium offers Memorial Tablets and Memorial Plates elegantly designed and with respect to the Chinese traditions and cultures. There is a dedicated floor to place these Memorial Tablets and Plates in an ambience of reverence and serenity.
token.mem-hall-writeup: There is a grand reception hall to greet visitors, an impressive Memorial Hall for wake services, and Prayer Halls for remembering our departed loved ones.
token.amenities-writeup: For visitors’ comfort and relaxation, there are amenities in the building including a Café and a Sky Park, and sofas at designated rest areas clustering around the spacious Concourses at each floor.  Our Sky Park is professionally landscaped and is filled with blossoming flowers and plants.  All areas are guarded by 24-hour security, a high-tech system of premises monitoring and centralised computer access control on all floors.
token.background-aspiration-writeup: The Company was formerly known as Bumijaya Pengurusan Kualiti Sdn Bhd, and changed its name to City Centre Columbarium Sdn Bhd on 24 September 2020.  It was previously a private limited company incorporated in Malaysia under the Companies Act 1965 on 3 September 2014 and was subsequently converted to a public limited company on 12 October 2020. The Company’s mission is to build and manage a unique, innovative and prestigious Columbarium in Kuala Lumpur city centre, and servicing our clients with utmost professionalism and responsibility.  We aspire to be a caring bereavement care provider sensitive to the needs and requirements for each and every one of our clients.  We believe City Centre Columbarium will be a new landmark.
